sources.title: Rough Riding Ranger
sources.description: Title: Rough Riding Ranger Summary: Hanson is using Bobby's carrier pigeons to receive messages. His man Slim shoots them down before they reach Bobby. When Slim is injured, Ranger Daniels posing as a drunk gets the job. He ... Directed by: Elmer Clifton Actors: Rex Lease, Bobby Nelson, Janet Chandler Production Company: Weiss Productions Release Date: September 1935 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Hanson is using Bobby's carrier pigeons to receive messages. His man Slim shoots them down before they reach Bobby. When Slim is injured, Ranger Daniels posing as a drunk gets the job. He misses the next pigeon on purpose and gets the message from Bobby. But his identity has now become known and the gang rides to get him.

sources.title: Rough Riding Ranger
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Rough Riding Ranger (1935) REX LEASE
sources.description:
Stars: Rex Lease, Bobby Nelson, Janet Chandler 
Director: Elmer Clifton

A Texas Ranger is on assignment to crack a smuggling ring using carrier pigeons on the Tex-Mex border!

metadata.Plot: Hanson is using Bobby's carrier pigeons to receive messages. His man Slim shoots them down before they reach Bobby. When Slim is injured, Ranger Daniels posing as a drunk gets the job. He misses the next pigeon on purpose and gets the message from Bobby. But his identity has now become known and the gang rides to get him.
metadata.Actors: Rex Lease, Bobby Nelson, Janet Chandler
